title: General’s Fiery Farmwife - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient Times   Cute Children   Farming   Female Protagonist   Generals   R*pe   Transmigration   Ugly to Beautiful
author: Yao Yao   夭夭
description: She was a commercial genius in her original life. After rebirth, she became a fat and ugly widow of a farmer! Qin Ya thought that as long as her brain was not impaired, she could build another business empire within minutes. However, what if she had a husband, who was supposed to be dead, hanging around her, having dirty talks all day long and always leering at her…>
